resources.string: Get recommendations for stuff we think you\'ll love based on stuff you already love. Just enter the name of a movie, show, book, author, game or music. Give it a try!
"Since you\'re into \n %s, \n you might also enjoy:
Type in something to search for

This app uses the TasteDive API to retrieve results from the TasteDive recommendation engine. TasteDive uses crowd sourced reviews to suggest \"liked\" media from users with similar tastes. The more reviews the engine has, the better the recommendations are, so feel free to go to their website and rate some media.
TasteDive is a recommendation engine that helps you explore your taste!
